## PreflightTest.stop() method

Stop the ongoing PreflightTest.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stop(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

A Promise that - Resolves if the PreflightTest was successfully stopped. - Rejects if the native layer encountered an error.
